summary: A small ruined Dwemer Tower very near to the Alchemist\'s Shack. It adds a new bow, and several Hags and Witches to take down.
descriptionHtml:
Situated on the road to Ivarstead from Helgen, Northmoon Tower has been infested with foul Hags, to think it was once claimed by the Dwemer. Who knows what these Witches want, all you know is that there is a Rare Bow down there that needs to be claimed - Dwemer Fury. It is said that it has the power to knock back the sturdiest of warriors, and electrocute them while they\'re down.

DWEMER FURY STATS

A base damage of around about 16-18, 20 points of Shock Damage, and the ability to knock back most enemies for 3 seconds.

INSTALLATION

Download with NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) and the activate it in your mods tab.

This was my first attempt at making a Dungeon, so if you like it don\'t forget to tell your friends about it, the more people the better
author: PorkiousMaximus
